synopsis.text: In the quiet life of high school student, Kisaragi Ryuuji, an unexpected adventure unfolds with the sudden return of his second cousin, Eriko, from abroad. Recruited into Eriko's organization, the Seven Tails, Ryuuji's mission becomes the pursuit of mystical artifacts known as Lost Precious. Their journey takes a dramatic turn when they intercept a relic box from a sinister black broker, Fang. Inside the box, they discover a girl adorned with a rose-like pattern on her hand, whom Ryuuji affectionately names Rose. However, Rose is no ordinary girl; she is a Red Dragon. To shield Rose from the malevolent black organization, Ryuuji, empowered as a level 10 Breaker, vows to protect her, leading to a thrilling series of encounters in this new, extraordinary world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
